channel.title: The OFC Fight Feed
channel.description: The RSS feed of Otaniemi Fight Club.

item.title: True Training at Tatamisali
item.description: This Monday we had the pleasure to rewelcome an experienced fighter, Teemu, back into our ranks. His return brings about not only a guarantee of hard trainings ahead, but also an increased pace of learning for all of us.

item.title: Bank Account Updated
item.description: The club's bank account was changed. Do not make any transfers to the old anymore! From now on, always confirm the correct account number from the club's treasurer (currently Bosco).

item.title: Beau Bashing at Otahalli
item.description: Today we had a French boxer, Roman, match us. His strong experience and skill makes it a privilidge to fight him. Our pro-looking boxing made Otahalli bystanders observe our training in awe. Some good on-the-spot marketing here, eh!?

item.title: UFC and Tortillas at Kattosauna!
item.description: OFC organized an open event at Kattosauna: The latest matches in UFC, tortillas, and sauna -- What could be better?

item.title: First XQ to Honbu's Friday karate!
item.description: OFC did their first XQ to Honbus Friday karate session. OFC's 8 participants were instructed by Honbu's Juri Maki. Great success!

item.title: New web site launched!
item.description: OFC's new AYY based web site got launched. Please share your comments at the Facebook group!
